Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Jeff Frye
Dear Sir,
Jeff Frye is hitting the ball well at A Winter Haven Red Sox!
He has an AVG of .378, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
